languages.text:
Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If Overseer has Dogmatic — 2, upon redirecting 5 abilities Servoskull deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} shock damage with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} penetration to enemies in its extrapolation area.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If Overseer has Dogmatic — 2, upon redirecting 5 abilities Servoskull deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} shock damage with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} penetration to enemies in its extrapolation area.

languages.text:
Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, once the servo-skull swarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} 5 abilities in total, it immediately deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius. Then, the ability counter is reset.
languages.original_text:
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполируемая{/g} через рой сервочерепов, действует на других существ, рой получает суммирующийся бонус +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}.
Если надзиратель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — сторонник, то рой сервочерепов, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполировав{/g} 5 способностей суммарно, немедленно наносит {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% каждому врагу в радиусе 4 клеток от себя. После этого счетчик способностей обнуляется.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü tarafından {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlenen{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} diğer yaratıkları etkilediğinde hizmelet sürüsü, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliklerine +5 bonus (üst üste birikebilen) kazanır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse hizmelet sürüsü, toplamda 5 kabiliyeti {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlediğinde{/g} 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki her bir düşmana %{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri ile{uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarı{/g} verir. Ardından kabiliyet sayacı sıfırlanır.

traits.locale_text:

Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse hizmelet sürüsü, toplamda 5 kabiliyeti {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlediğinde{/g} 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki her bir düşmana %{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri ile{uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarı{/g} verir. Ardından kabiliyet sayacı sıfırlanır.

Hizmelet sürüsü tarafından {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlenen{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} diğer yaratıkları etkilediğinde hizmelet sürüsü, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliklerine +5 bonus (üst üste birikebilen) kazanır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text:
Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolada{/g} a través del enjambre de servocráneos afecta a otras criaturas, el enjambre de servocráneos gana una bonificación acumulativa de +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}.
Si el supervisor tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Partidario, cuando el enjambre de servocráneos {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapola{/g} un total de 5 capacidades, inflige inmediatamente {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} con un {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a todos los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas. Después reinicia el contador de capacidades.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, once the servo-skull swarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} 5 abilities in total, it immediately deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius. Then, the ability counter is reset.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolada{/g} a través del enjambre de servocráneos afecta a otras criaturas, el enjambre de servocráneos gana una bonificación acumulativa de +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}.
Si el supervisor tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Partidario, cuando el enjambre de servocráneos {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapola{/g} un total de 5 capacidades, inflige inmediatamente {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} con un {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a todos los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas. Después reinicia el contador de capacidades.

Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolada{/g} a través del enjambre de servocráneos afecta a otras criaturas, el enjambre de servocráneos gana una bonificación acumulativa de +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}.

languages.text:
每当伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响到其他生物时，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高5点，此效果可叠加，持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
如果监察官拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——拥护者，则当伺服头骨集群合计{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}5次能力之后，它会对距离4格以内的所有敌人造成{uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}点{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。攻击结束后，计数器重置。

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, once the servo-skull swarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} 5 abilities in total, it immediately deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius. Then, the ability counter is reset.

每当伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响到其他生物时，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高5点，此效果可叠加，持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text:
Wenn eine durch den Servoschädel-Schwarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolierte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} andere Kreaturen beeinflusst, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} einen stapelbaren Bonus von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Wenn der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Anhänger hat un der Servoschädel-Schwarm insgesamt 5 Fähigkeiten {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapoliert{/g}, fügt er jedem Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern sofort {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} mit {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu. Danach wird der Fähigkeitenzähler zurückgesetzt.

Wenn eine durch den Servoschädel-Schwarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolierte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} andere Kreaturen beeinflusst, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} einen stapelbaren Bonus von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolée{/g} par l'essaim de servocrânes affecte d'autres créatures, il gagne un bonus cumulable de +5 bonus à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.
Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Partisan, une fois que l'essaim de servocrânes a {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolé{/g} 5 capacités au total, il inflige immédiatement {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} avec +{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 4 cases. Le compteur de cette capacité est ensuite réinitialisé.
languages.original_text:
Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, once the servo-skull swarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} 5 abilities in total, it immediately deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius. Then, the ability counter is reset.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolée{/g} par l'essaim de servocrânes affecte d'autres créatures, il gagne un bonus cumulable de +5 bonus à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.
Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Partisan, une fois que l'essaim de servocrânes a {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolé{/g} 5 capacités au total, il inflige immédiatement {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} avec +{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 4 cases. Le compteur de cette capacité est ensuite réinitialisé.

Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolée{/g} par l'essaim de servocrânes affecte d'autres créatures, l'essaim gagne un bonus cumulable de +5 bonus à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿された{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が他の生物に影響を与える間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了までサーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}に+5のボーナスがスタックされる。
監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} — 門下生の場合、サーヴォスカル・スウォームが計5つのアビリティを{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿する{/g}と、半径4セルの敵につき、{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で{uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}の{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を即座に与える。その後、アビリティカウンターはリセットされる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects other creatures, the servo-skull swarm gains a stacking +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, once the servo-skull swarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} 5 abilities in total, it immediately deals {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius. Then, the ability counter is reset.

監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} — 門下生の場合、サーヴォスカル・スウォームが計5つのアビリティを{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿する{/g}と、半径4セルの敵につき、{uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で{uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}の{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を即座に与える。その後、アビリティカウンターはリセットされる。
サーヴォスカルスウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿{/g}されたアビリティが他の生物に影響を与える間、監督者の次のターンの終了までサーヴォスカルスウォームの知性と連帯に+5のボーナスがスタックされる。
サーヴォスカルスウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿{/g}されたアビリティが他の生物に影響を与える間、監督者の次のターンの終了までサーヴォスカルスウォームの知性と連帯に+5のボーナスがスタックされる。

languages.text:
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполируемая{/g} через рой сервочерепов, действует на других существ, рой получает суммирующийся бонус +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}.
Если надзиратель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — сторонник, то рой сервочерепов, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполировав{/g} 5 способностей суммарно, немедленно наносит {uip|DMG|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} {uip|PEN|69fd340db26640ceaf4d43ce7de18680}% каждому врагу в радиусе 4 клеток от себя. После этого счетчик способностей обнуляется.
